nodes.text: The Gomar sector was a sector in the galaxy. During the Galactic Civil War, Rebel agents Adame and Selentia requested to borrow the Millennium Falcon from her owner, Han Solo, for a few days to travel to the Gomar sector as part of a mission on behalf of Leia Organa. Their request was declined, however, as Solo instead went to speak with Organa on the matter personally.
The Gomar sector was first mentioned in the 2016 comic book Han Solo 1, written by Marjorie Liu.
